item.description:

  • SKINTYPES: Suitable for all skin types in over 25 year-olds.

item.title: Algae Bioactive Concentrate Face Oil 30 ml

item.description: A delicate formula designed to intensely hydrate and relieve signs of fatigue and puffiness. How it works: The Eye Serum formula contains actives that target dark circles and puffiness, hydrate, promote collagen production, prevent UV-induced collagen degradation, fight against environmental aggressors, and reduce free radical damage. Results: The skin of the delicate eye area is brighter, de-stressed, firmer, and deeply hydrated on a cellular level. The visibility of fine lines and wrinkles is diminished, and signs of fatigue and puffiness are relieved. Cooling roller applicator, Delicate lightweight texture, Dermatologically tested, No fragrance, Responsibly selected ingredients with traceability, Suitable for vegans and all skin types.

item.description:
This universal comforting cream contains the mineral-rich bioactive BLUE LAGOON SEAWATER, a geothermal source known for its clinically proven healing benefits on skin. The gentle formula helps soothe dry, irritated, and sensitive skin as it moisturizes and restores the skin barrier. Mineral Moisturizing Cream is used at the well-established Blue Lagoon Medical Clinic in Iceland. Since 1994, the Clinic has been offering an effective natural psoriasis treatment for people coming from all over the world.
  • SKINTYPES: Dry Skin, Sensitive Skin
  • BENEFITS: Prevent, relieve, soothe, moisturize, nourish, comfort.

item.description:
How it works:
BL+ Retinol Cream 0.3% contains bioactives that work to accelerate cellular turnover, promote collagen production, prevent UV-induced collagen degradation, and minimize the appearance of wrinkles, pores, and blemishes.
Results:
Skin gradually becomes smoother and more radiant as the texture is renewed and refined. The appearance of fine lines and wrinkles is diminished.
* Retinol is very potent, slow build-up is recommended * May increase photosensitivity, apply sun protection during the day * Dermatologically tested * No fragrance * Responsibly selected ingredients with traceability * Suitable for vegans * Suitable for normal, combination and oily skin * Avoid use during pregnancy
item.title: BL+ retinol cream 0.3%
